Articles.Content:
KSP needs two new parts, an elbow hinge and a pivot hinge.

It has been mentioned that in future updates the aerodynamic model will be more realistic. When this happens, ship designs will have to have a more compact frontal area. A real-world solution to this, is to collapse sections and deploy them in orbit. This solution requires hinges.

Also, these parts would allow players to create a more stable center of mass on many of our ships. Which would be a big help during the boost phase.

These are available in the Magic Smoke Industries robotics mod

Robotics/Mechanics is also on the what not to suggest list at the top of the thread

This is among the things that has been suggested a lot, and you can already get it from various game mods like infernal robotics.

Please note that as such it is an item that is present on the "What Not to Suggest" list found here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/36863-What-not-to-suggest

That list is comprised of suggestions that are made all the time and either are planned for future content without a set release date or will not be implemented as a stock feature.

As NoMrBond said, this is indeed on the What Not To Suggest list. That said, thread closed.
